patterns: what are the symptoms of asthma?
responses: Trouble sleeping caused by shortness of breath
Coughing or wheezing attacks that are worsened by a respiratory virus
such as a cold or the flu

patterns: what are the symptoms of copd?
what are the symptoms of cystic fibrosis?
responses: Persistent cough that produces thick mucus
Inflamed nasal passages or recurrent sinusitis

patterns: what are the symptoms of epilepsy?
responses: Uncontrollable jerking movements of the arms and legs

patterns: what are the symptoms of a migraine?
what are the symptoms of carpal tunnel syndrome?
responses: Weakness in the hand and arm

patterns: what are the symptoms of plantar fasciitis?
responses: Stabbing pain in the bottom of your foot near the heel
Pain is usually worst with the first steps in the morning
or after standing for long periods

patterns: what are the symptoms of sciatica?
responses: Pain that radiates from your lower back through your buttock and down the back of your leg
Numbness or weakness in the affected leg or foot

patterns: what are the symptoms of a rotator cuff injury?
responses: Dull ache deep in the shoulder

patterns: what are the symptoms of tennis elbow?
responses: Pain and tenderness on the outside of the elbow
Pain radiating into the forearm and wrist

patterns: what are the symptoms of golfers elbow?
responses: Pain and tenderness on the inside of the elbow
Pain radiating into the forearm and wrist

patterns: what are the symptoms of bursitis?
responses: Tenderness when you press around the joint

patterns: what are the symptoms of tendinitis?
responses: Pain and tenderness in the affected area

patterns: what are the symptoms of arthritis?
what are the symptoms of osteoporosis?
responses: A bone fracture that occurs much more easily than expected

patterns: what are the symptoms of gallstones?
responses: Sudden and rapidly intensifying pain in the upper right portion of your abdomen
Sudden and rapidly intensifying pain in the center of your abdomen
Back pain between your shoulder blades

patterns: what are the symptoms of kidney stones?
responses: Severe pain in the side and back
Pain that radiates to the lower abdomen and groin
Pain that comes in waves and fluctuates in intensity
Pain or burning sensation while urinating
Fever and chills if an infection is present

patterns: what are the symptoms of appendicitis?
responses: Sudden pain that begins on the right side of the lower abdomen
Sudden pain that begins around your navel and often shifts to your lower right abdomen
Pain that worsens if you cough
walk or make other jarring movements
Low-grade fever that may worsen as the illness progresses

patterns: what are the symptoms of diverticulitis?
responses: Constant pain in the lower left side of the abdomen

patterns: what are the symptoms of hemorrhoids?
responses: Itching or irritation in your anal region

patterns: what are the symptoms of a hernia?
responses: A bulge or swelling that may be pushed back in or disappears when lying down
A feeling of weakness or pressure in the groin
gurgling or aching sensation at the bulge

patterns: what are the symptoms of anemia?
what are the symptoms of hyperthyroidism?
what are the symptoms of hypothyroidism?
responses: stiffness or swelling in your joints
Heavier than normal or irregular menstrual periods

patterns: what are the symptoms of diabetes mellitus?
what are the symptoms of hypertension?
responses: Most people with high blood pressure have no signs or symptoms
even if blood pressure readings reach dangerously high levels
A few people with high blood pressure may have headaches
but these signs and symptoms aren't specific and usually don't occur until high blood pressure has reached a severe or life-threatening stage

patterns: what are the symptoms of hypotension?
what are the symptoms of strep throat?
responses: Tiny red spots on the soft or hard palate

patterns: what are the symptoms of pneumonia?
responses: Chest pain when you breathe or cough
Confusion or changes in mental awareness (in adults age 65 and older)
Lower than normal body temperature (in adults older than age 65 and people with weak immune systems)

what are the symptoms of influenza?
what are the symptoms of the common cold?
responses: Slight body aches or a mild headache

responses: especially in the center of the pelvis and around the area of the pubic bone

responses: Burning sensation or pain when urinating
Pus or blood in your urine
